attributes.title: One Star
attributes.review: Should I have to explain the poor quality of this app? I thought I was the only one going through the constant glitching and lag, however looking at these reviews convinced me that I was not the only one. Fixing the bugs in this app would not make it be any better. The layout is a bit confusing as well. It requires your user information, phone number, in order for you to actually go through it. This was overall an unnecessary application and I deleted it immediately after going through it. I cannot believe I downloaded it in the first place.
